title: Need to know about JavaScript array
details: Array is a special type of variable than can hold multiple value in one variable. But in JavaScript an array is a type of object that stores a collection of values. The values can be of any data type, such as numbers, strings, or objects, and are stored in a specific order.
The values in array are organized by their index number which is starts form 0. We can accessed any value by their index number. Like: arrName[2]
To check the array length we can use the length property by arrName.length
To add a value in an existing array we can use push method. Like: arrName.push('value')
For removing any value we can use pop method. ex: arrName.pop()
